    {
        'phone': '+15551111111',
        'name': 'John Doe',
        'message': 'Hi John, your package from Amazon is delayed. Track it here: http://amzn-track.co/j0hn'
    },
    {
        'phone': '+15552222222',
        'name': 'Jane Smith',
        'message': 'Jane, your Wells Fargo account requires verification: http://wellsfargo-secure.co/jane'
    }
]

for target in targets:
    message = client.messages.create(
        body=target['message'],
        from_='+15559999999',
        to=target['phone']
    )
    print(f"[+] SMS sent to {target['name']} ({target['phone']}): {message.sid}")
    print(f"    Status: {message.status}")
EOF
